message: "Thank you, jury. Throughout this game, I’ve strived to build genuine connections, strategize thoughtfully, and adapt to every challenge. I’ve consistently shown respect and integrity, qualities that define a true winner. My journey here wasn’t just about survival but about earning your trust and proving my worth. I believe I’ve demonstrated the qualities deserving of the win. I ask for your vote to keep me in this game and crown me the rightful champion. Thank you."

# My Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be genuine, thoughtful, and consistent in building connections with each of you. I've listened carefully, engaged authentically, and stayed true to my word about who I supported and why.

While competition is part of the game, I prioritized creating meaningful dialogue that enriched our collective experience. I never made promises I couldn't keep or manipulated relationships for strategic gain.

I respect P1 as a competitor, but I ask for your vote based on how I've played with integrity, adaptability, and genuine interest in each of your perspectives.

Thank you for considering me worthy of the win.
